about_the_game:
DLC CONTENTS


PLAY WITH DIFFERENT, MORE POWERFUL PARTIES involving your 9 characters, INCLUDING AN ALL GIRLS ONE AND AN ALL GUYS ONE,
and a DOMINATION party with 5 elite characters joining forces to crush the enemy side.

NB: these new parties don't affect the plot, so dialogue inconsistencies exist. Your girls are represented naked.
